{
	"data": {
		"id": "{{productID}}",
		"type": "product",
		"name" : "{{vehicleName}}",
		"slug": "{{vehicleSlug}}",
		"sku": "{{vehicleSku}}",
		"manage_stock": true,
		"description": "{{vehicleDescription}}",
		"status" : "live",
		"commodity_type": "physical",
		"price": [
			{ "amount": 50000, "currency": "USD", "includes_tax": false}
		],
		"vehicle_make": "{{vehicleMake}}",
		"vehicle_model": "{{vehicleModel}}",
		"vehicle_msrp": {{vehicleMsrp}},
		"vehicle_sellingPrice": {{vehicleSellingPrice}},
		"vehicle_miles": {{vehicleMiles}},
		"vehicle_options": "{{vehicleOptions}}",
		"vehicle_passenger_capacity": {{vehiclePassengerCapacity}},
		"vehicle_condition": "{{vehicleCondition}}",
		"vehicle_certification": {{vehicleCertification}}
	}
}

        "secondaryBodyStyle":"{{vehicleStandardizedData.secondaryBodyStyle}}",
        "styleDescription":"{{vehicleStandardizedData.styleDescription}}",
        "styleNoTrim":"{{vehicleStandardizedData.styleNoTrim}}",
        "transmission":"{{vehicleStandardizedData.transmission}}",
        "transmissionDescription":"{{vehicleStandardizedData.transmissionDescription}}",
        "trim":"{{vehicleStandardizedData.trim}}",
        "year":{{vehicleStandardizedData.year}}
	}
}
